title: Amid heatwave, Delhi's power demand touches an all-time high of 8,000MW
description: Delhi recorded its highest peak power demand of 8000 MW during a heatwave, breaking previous records. The State Load Dispatch Centre (SLDC) and India Meteorological Department issued alerts. BSES discoms successfully met the demand. Tata Power met 2225 MW in North Delhi without outages. Air conditioning contributes significantly to energy use.
